item.confluence.necromantic_scroll.info: Can be found in End City chests.

item.confluence.hercules_beetle.info: Can be found in Nether Fortress chests.

[Magic Source Expansion] Mana afflictions no longer reduce Iron Magic damage, regarded as §4-2.0§9 natural health regeneration during effects (not stacking with mana sickness)
item.confluence.chaos_stone.info: It definitely drops from the Ender Dragon.
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.mana_polariz: Restores [damage amount 10%] health when dealing vanilla magic damage
Restores [current mana percentage * damage amount 10%] health when dealing iron magic spell damage
Restores [current mana source percentage * damage amount 10%] health when dealing magic rune damage
When installed with §eIron Magic/Nova Magic§f, if current §eMana/Mana Source both exceed 50%%§f, counts as §4-0.3§9 natural health regeneration
item.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_community: Unity Heart of the Origin Stone
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_communit: Slight attribute boosts for all properties, increasing as game progresses

Under default settings, each elite enemy/BOSS kill increases [0.25%% critical chance + 0.5%% melee/magic/ranged damage + 0.25%% summon damage + 0.5%% max health + 0.25%% damage reduction + 0.5%% armor + 1%% movement speed + 0.03%% natural life regeneration]
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.iron_mana_fl:
§eWhen health is below§950§9%%§e, automatically consumes §9Arcane Source§e in inventory, restores §925 mana§9+§95§9%%§9 max mana, but gains 5s of §9mana sickness§e
§e(Mana Sickness — reduces §925§9%%§e Iron Magic spell damage)
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_communit: Current number of elite enemies defeated: §e%s
Unity Heart of the Origin Stone has reached its peak power
death.attack.truedamage: %1$s's life has fully sublimated into magic.

tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.ammo_box.tex: [TACZ Link] Right-click to gain 10 minutes of [Economy] status, with 20%% chance not to consume ammunition when firing guns
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.glyph_scribe: [Nova Magic Link] Right-click to gain 10 minutes of [Mana Source] status, increasing magic damage by 2.5%% and mana source cap by 5%%
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.arcane_scrol: [Iron Magic Link] Right-click to gain 10 minutes of [Arcane] status, increasing magic damage by 2.5%% and maximum mana by 5%%

tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.discount_car: Grants Village Hero I effect, equivalent to 30%% trade discount
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.lucky_coin.t: 10%% chance to drop 1-10 emeralds when dealing damage
item.confluence.coin_curios.info: Has a small chance to drop when Ravager, Enchanter, Warden, or Ravager dies.
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.chlorophyte_: 50%% chance for fired projectiles to track targets
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.ammo_box.desc: 20%% chance not to consume a bullet when shooting

effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.iron_arcane.d: Each level increases mana capacity and magic damage by 5%% and 2.5%% respectively
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.merfolk.descr: Each level grants 50%% swimming speed (only effective in water)
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.archery.descr: Each level increases projectile damage by 5%%
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.honey.descrip: Each level increases natural life regeneration rate by 0.2 and reduces speed by 10%% (effectively reduces luck by 10%%)
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.cozy_fire.des: Each level increases natural life regeneration rate by 0.1
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.heart_lamp.de: Each level increases natural life regeneration rate by 0.2
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.sharpened.des: Each level increases armor penetration by 12
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.sugar_rush.de: Each level increases speed and mining speed by 20%
Each level increases magic damage by 5% (also increases max mana / mana source cap if installed with Iron Magic / Nova Magic)
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.strategist.de: Each level increases summon damage by 5%
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.bewitched.des: Each level increases summon damage by 5%
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.mana_sickness: Reduces Iron Magic spell damage by 25% (if equipped with Chaos Stone, reduces natural life regeneration by 2 points)
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.gotey_potenc: When casting with Crystalline, the level of potent effect increases by *[Crystalline potency multiplier] attribute
The final effective level is the integer part, and it is valid only if the Crystalline itself has a level of effect
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.goety_soul_a: Deals damage and recovers [damage amount * Soul Absorption attribute] of soul
In default configuration, at most, it recovers 10%% of the player's current container soul, and does not exceed 75%% of the soul capacity of the container
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.brewer_hat.t: Drinking brewing or potions has a 10%% chance not to consume brewing
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.master_brewe: Drinking brewing or potions has a 15%% chance not to consume brewing
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.dimensional_: Damage dealt by the wearer increases by 20%%, while damage taken by the wearer also increases by 15%%
item.confluence.dimensional_soul_artifac: It has a low probability to generate in End City chests.
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.ars_extensio: When installing the [Magic Expansion] mod, you can obtain [Magic Source Flower] accessory series with [Consume Magic Source Berries to Recover Magic Source] ability
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.curse_inject: [Desolate Witchcraft Linkage] Right-click to gain 10min of [Curse Power] status, Crystalline effect multiplier increases by 25%%, armor value decreases by 20%%
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.curse_power.d: Crystalline effect multiplier increases by 50%%, armor value decreases by 20%%
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.spirit_brooc: Even if the main hand does not hold a sickle, kills by the wearer can drop pure soul
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.spirit_spoil: Increases the quantity of pure souls dropped when the wearer kills a creature
item.confluence.ichor.info: It has a chance to drop when wither boss dies.
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.golden_showe: Deals magic damage and applies Spirit Fluid III effect for 10s to the target (compatible with Iron Magic, Rebirth Magic Art)
When dealing ranged damage, applies Spirit Fluid III effect for 10s to the target (compatible with TACZ)
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.flask_of_ich: When dealing melee damage, applies Spirit Fluid III effect for 10s to the target
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.ichor.descrip: Reduces target's armor by 5 points per level
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.ichor.text: Spirit Fluid: Each level reduces target's armor by 5 points
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.spirit_altar: [Spirit Disaster Linkage] Right-click to gain 10min of [Soul Vision] status, increased level of soul drops upon killing creatures
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.assassin_sco: Gains bonus damage based on the time interval since the last shot, reaching 50%% bonus damage at 3 seconds
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.rapid_fire_s: Gains bonus damage when firing repeatedly, reaching 20%% bonus damage after 10 consecutive shots, bonus resets if no shot within 5 seconds
Provides [Tungsten Steel Barrier IV] status, increases armor, and consumes status level to offset damage when hit
§aUnder Tungsten Steel Barrier status, each level provides 2.5 armor and 1 point of damage offset
§2When status is below level 4, the matrix requires 10 seconds to charge, taking damage or removing it during charging will reset the timer
item.confluence.rover_drive.info: It has a probability to drop when an iron golem dies.
Each level of the status provides 2.5 armor and 1 point of damage offset
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.wulfrum_batt: Allows the wearer's followers to maintain a glowing state continuously
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_sponge.t: §bProvides [Quantum Foam Barrier X] status, increasing armor, armor toughness, and damage reduction, and consuming status level when hit
Under Quantum Foam Barrier status, each level provides 1.5 armor, 1.5 armor toughness, and 1%% damage reduction, which can offset 1~3.6 damage points
§9When level is below 10, this item needs 9 seconds to charge, after 9 seconds, it recovers 2 levels of status per second. Damage or removal during charging resets the timer.
effect.wizard_terra_cuiros.the_sponge_sh: Each level provides 1.5 armor and 1.5 armor toughness, and can offset 1~3.6 damage points
item.confluence.deific_amulet.tooltip: Increases invincibility duration after taking damage, with a 50%% longer duration than the Cross Necklace
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.honey_dew.te: Continuously grants Honey status effect to the wearer
When gaining a non-positive buff, it counts as +0.2 health regeneration
When sneaking, it counts as +0.3 health regeneration
tooltip.wizard_terra_cuiros.radiant_ooze: Increases natural health regeneration based on lost health, providing an extra 0.8hp/s when at or below 20% health
